official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project to construct Appalachian Highway Corridor X from Appalachian Highway Corridor V near Fulton, Mississippi, to Interstate Route 59 at Birmingham, Alabama.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project: (1) to construct Appalachian Highway Corridor X from Appalachian Highway Corridor V near Fulton, Mississippi, to Interstate Route 59 at Birmingham, Alabama; and (2) which, upon completion, shall be added to the Federal-aid primary system. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project to construct Appalachian Highway Corridor X from Appalachian Highway Corridor V near Fulton, Mississippi, to Interstate Route 59 at Birmingham, Alabama.
